event.description: Carlos Santana homers (1) on a fly ball to right center field.
Francisco Lindor walks.
Rangers challenged (tag play), call on the field was overturned: With Michael Brantley batting, Francisco Lindor caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Robinson Chirinos to shortstop Elvis Andrus.
Michael Brantley strikes out swinging.
Edwin Encarnacion called out on strikes.
Jose Ramirez flies out to center fielder Carlos Gomez.
Brandon Guyer singles on a line drive to center fielder Carlos Gomez.
Yandy Diaz lines out to center fielder Carlos Gomez.
Yan Gomes walks. Brandon Guyer to 2nd.
Austin Jackson singles on a ground ball to center fielder Carlos Gomez. Brandon Guyer scores. Yan Gomes to 2nd.
Carlos Santana singles on a ground ball to center fielder Carlos Gomez. Yan Gomes scores. Austin Jackson to 2nd.
Francisco Lindor grounds into a force out, second baseman Rougned Odor to shortstop Elvis Andrus. Carlos Santana out at 2nd.
Michael Brantley singles on a line drive to left fielder Ryan Rua.
Edwin Encarnacion walks. Michael Brantley to 2nd.
Jose Ramirez grounds into a double play, shortstop Elvis Andrus to second baseman Rougned Odor to first baseman Mike Napoli. Michael Brantley to 3rd. Edwin Encarnacion out at 2nd.
Brandon Guyer flies out to center fielder Carlos Gomez.
Yandy Diaz called out on strikes.
Yan Gomes grounds out, second baseman Rougned Odor to first baseman Mike Napoli.
Austin Jackson lines out to first baseman Mike Napoli.
Carlos Santana flies out to right fielder Nomar Mazara.
Francisco Lindor lines out to right fielder Nomar Mazara.
Michael Brantley strikes out swinging.
Edwin Encarnacion pops out to third baseman Joey Gallo in foul territory.
Jose Ramirez walks.
Brandon Guyer singles on a ground ball to left fielder Ryan Rua. Jose Ramirez out at 3rd, left fielder Ryan Rua to shortstop Elvis Andrus. Brandon Guyer to 2nd on the throw.
Yandy Diaz grounds out, pitcher Martin Perez to first baseman Mike Napoli.
Pitching Change: Jeremy Jeffress replaces Martin Perez.
Yan Gomes strikes out swinging.
Austin Jackson singles on a soft ground ball to third baseman Joey Gallo.
Pitching Change: Dario Alvarez replaces Jeremy Jeffress.
Carlos Santana walks. Austin Jackson to 2nd.
Francisco Lindor strikes out swinging.
Michael Brantley singles on a ground ball to left fielder Ryan Rua. Austin Jackson scores. Carlos Santana to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Jose Leclerc replaces Dario Alvarez.
Edwin Encarnacion flies out to left fielder Ryan Rua.
Jose Ramirez flies out to center fielder Carlos Gomez.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Abraham Almonte replaces Brandon Guyer.
Abraham Almonte strikes out swinging.
Yandy Diaz pops out to first baseman Mike Napoli in foul territory.
Umpire reviewed (home run), call on the field was upheld: Foul.
Yan Gomes strikes out swinging.
Austin Jackson strikes out swinging, catcher Robinson Chirinos to first baseman Mike Napoli.
Pitching Change: Alex Claudio replaces Jose Leclerc.
Carlos Santana grounds out softly, third baseman Joey Gallo to first baseman Mike Napoli.
Carlos Gomez lines out sharply to right fielder Brandon Guyer.
Shin-Soo Choo strikes out swinging.
Nomar Mazara lines out to center fielder Austin Jackson.
Mike Napoli lines out to third baseman Yandy Diaz.
Rougned Odor singles on a line drive to center fielder Austin Jackson.
Ryan Rua grounds into a force out, third baseman Yandy Diaz to second baseman Jose Ramirez. Rougned Odor out at 2nd. Ryan Rua to 1st.
Joey Gallo homers (1) on a fly ball to right field. Ryan Rua scores.
Elvis Andrus walks.
Robinson Chirinos strikes out swinging.
Carlos Gomez pops out to catcher Yan Gomes in foul territory.
Shin-Soo Choo singles on a ground ball to left fielder Michael Brantley.
Nomar Mazara singles on a sharp line drive to right fielder Brandon Guyer. Shin-Soo Choo to 3rd. Nomar Mazara out at 2nd, right fielder Brandon Guyer to shortstop Francisco Lindor.
Mike Napoli hit by pitch.
Rougned Odor strikes out swinging.
Ryan Rua grounds out, second baseman Jose Ramirez to first baseman Carlos Santana.
Joey Gallo strikes out swinging.
Elvis Andrus lines out to second baseman Jose Ramirez.
Robinson Chirinos strikes out swinging.
Carlos Gomez strikes out swinging.
Shin-Soo Choo bunt grounds out, pitcher Carlos Carrasco to first baseman Carlos Santana.
Nomar Mazara flies out to left fielder Michael Brantley.
Mike Napoli strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Boone Logan replaces Carlos Carrasco.
Rougned Odor pops out to second baseman Jose Ramirez.
Pitching Change: Bryan Shaw replaces Boone Logan.
Ryan Rua pops out to second baseman Jose Ramirez.
Joey Gallo singles on a line drive to center fielder Austin Jackson.
Elvis Andrus grounds into a double play, shortstop Francisco Lindor to second baseman Jose Ramirez to first baseman Carlos Santana. Joey Gallo out at 2nd.
Abraham Almonte remains in the game as the right fielder.
Defensive Substitution: Michael Martinez replaces third baseman Yandy Diaz, batting 7th, playing third base.
Pitching Change: Andrew Miller replaces Bryan Shaw.
Robinson Chirinos flies out to left fielder Michael Brantley.
Carlos Gomez pops out to second baseman Jose Ramirez.
Shin-Soo Choo flies out to left fielder Michael Brantley.
Pitching Change: Cody Allen replaces Andrew Miller.
Nomar Mazara doubles (2) on a ground ball to left fielder Michael Brantley.
Mike Napoli doubles (1) on a sharp fly ball to left fielder Michael Brantley. Nomar Mazara scores.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Delino DeShields replaces Mike Napoli.
Rougned Odor strikes out swinging.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Jurickson Profar replaces Ryan Rua.
Jurickson Profar called out on strikes.
Joey Gallo strikes out swinging.
